detectors.description:

ERC20.constructor(string,string).symbol (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LOPPACoin.sol#439) shadows:
	- ERC20.symbol() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LOPPACoin.sol#456-458) (function)

Address.isContract(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LOPPACoin.sol#201-210) uses assembly

Address._functionCallWithValue(address,bytes,uint256,string) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LOPPACoin.sol#294-315) uses assembly
	- INLINE ASM (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LOPPACoin.sol#307-310)
Pragma version^0.6.0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LOPPACoin.sol#1) allows old versions
solc-0.6.6 is not recommended for deployment

detectors.description:

	- (success) = recipient.call{value: amount}() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LOPPACoin.sol#232)

Low level call in Address._functionCallWithValue(address,bytes,uint256,string) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LOPPACoin.sol#294-315):
	- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LOPPACoin.sol#298)

LOPPACoin.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LOPPACoin.sol#692-694) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _mint(msg.sender,5400000 * 10 ** 18) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LOPPACoin.sol#693)
